Text.Page:
(Echo Arcana's surface is a web of tangled memories.)

[...sub devan...]

[...Dark Continent...]

[...Expedition...]

[...]

[...Imperial Army...]

[...the Fountain...]

[...construction of Castle Aranea...]Restore the Echo Arcana.

I knew you'd return, !
Was there any progress on the restoration of the Echo Arcana?"Somewhat. Take a look."

Ah, such a thing!
Their expedition was damned or perhaps ill-fated.

You think there may be more memories to restore?

We eagerly await the restoration of the Echo Arcana.

! I know you're just the to finish the job! "Of course I am."

Thank you. .

Here's a token of my gratitude.Nod.
